oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition funeral home movie, 1974 June
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording begins with woman leading service and man handling large serpent. Several members handle fire. A casket is brought to the front while members dance. Followed by a funeral service. A woman faints outside of church after funeral. Casket is brought out of church and transported to a cemetery. A sign reads "Palm Memorial Gardens".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Funeral rites and ceremonies; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Baptism, Funeral, and Wedding home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
